member.name: M:EasyEFA.Controllers.StationController.GetStations(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of all stations including the keyword
member.param: Search phrase for the stations you're looking for

member.name: M:EasyEFA.Controllers.StationController.GetDeparturesFromStationID(System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all departures at the specified datetime
member.param: ID of the station whose departures are returned
Requested time. If empty, the current time is used
